title: Sherlock Hound: The Movie
original_title: 劇場版アニメ 名探偵ホームズ
overview: A collection of two theatrical rereleases from 1984 and 1986, each containing two episodes from the Sherlock Hound TV series
synopsis: A collection of two theatrical rereleases from 1984 and 1986, each containing two episodes from the Sherlock Hound TV series
